item.description:
Bring your favorite games and join us for some fun as we try out another new location for Tuesday Open Game Night. Mikado is an Asian cuisine/sushi restaurant.  Check out their menu at www.mikadobeverly.com for details and prices. The restaurant is located in the North Beverly plaza located near Exit 20A off Rt 128 (same plaza as Panera Bread). The restaurant is open until 10:00 (however we may be allowed to stay up to 10:30 p.m. to finish up games). 

This event will be an open game night (Strategy, Word, Card, Dice and/or Party games). We will leave it up to group choice on what we play that night. If necessary, we will divide into smaller groups depending on group size and game preferences.

As per the usual policy, we ask everyone to please purchase something from the restaurant so we may continue to support the businesses which provide us with public meeting locations.  

Hope to see you there.
item.how_to_find_us: Host at front door should be able to direct you to our group.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Open Game Night in Beverly
